Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: melissa thayer
Reviews.Content: just had to get used to windows eight but the computer works well.  WE stopped using our desktop ever since we received this laptop

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!
Reviews.Author: Annette
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop, especially for the price. Haven't had any problems with it so far--boots up quickly and is easy to use. Windows 8 took a little adjustment but is fairly easy to get used to.I'm a graphic designer, so I use this computer all the time, and it works well for all of my programs (mainly Photoshop).I highly recommend this computer!

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for the $$!!
Reviews.Author: C.O.
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about buying a refurbished laptop as it was my 1st time.  However, the laptop was new and  I am very pleased with ths purchase so far!

Reviews.Title: Great laptop and price
Reviews.Author: Gator
Reviews.Content: This laptop has all the features you could ask for and a great price also.  After researching other laptops I found this one. It has the computing power and memory that will make my work on this machine up to date.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The laptop didn't work very well In the first place. then the power cord started to spark. Now it  doesn't work at all. very disappointed.
